Package controller

Class AddPartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AddPartController
  • public class AddPartController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the operations between the classes in the model package and the AddPart.fxml component.

      • savePartHandler

        public void savePartHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        RUNTIME ERROR: While working on this project I encountered several runtime errors. One of them was when trying to fill out the price field with letters, instead of numbers. The way I handled this error was by creating a try and catch statement that would try to convert the input into a double. To take care of this problem I created an array of Objects that contains the input from every field, then created a for loop that iterated over it checking if any field was empty. If they were, the name of that field was matched with an array of Strings that contains the name of the labels of each field. Combined with a String called exceptionMessage every error message is added at the end of that String and then its content is set into the exceptions label. This method handles the saving process for a new part.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • saveInHouse

        public void saveInHouse()
        This method saves the new part as an In House part.

      • saveOutsourced

        public void saveOutsourced()
        This method saves the new part as an Outsourced part.
